issue.title: [Java] Follow up on ARROW-1347 and make schema backward compatible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-1347 covered ListVector to have name of the field $data$ instead of [DEFAULT]
We left FixedSizeListVector behind.

Another case is backward compatibility - if schema was created before ARROW-1347 was in place  application may still suffer from side effects as it would not be updated based on new code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1663?focusedCommentId=16239777) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1193
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1193>
